title: Peaceful 2 Bed Garden Apt. in lush N. Berkeley! Pets Adored
posting_body: Hopkins Park is a unique, garden-style apartment community conveniently located within walking distance to North Berkeley Bart Station, AC Transit, shops, cafes, and a wide assortment of restaurants and grocery stores.
The lush, landscaped grounds and charming neighborhood make this a perfect place for anyone looking for a tranquil retreat a stones throw away from the bustle of University Ave.
Our daily soundtrack consists of birds and windchimes.
Yet, we're just minutes away from Acme Bread, Whole Foods, Tokyo Fish Market, Sprouts, Berkeley Natural Grocery, and Monterey Market.
We are parallel to the Ohlone Greenway, a smooth paved commuting and recreational corridor through Berkeley to Richmond.
We are nestled between Public Tennis Courts, Cedar-Rose Park and Peralta Community Garden.
Find vaulted ceilings on the second floor or hard luxury vinyl flooring on the first floor.
Either way, you’ll find yourself at home here.
We are   High-Speed Fiber Internet Ready
No more worrying about street cleaning tickets, it comes with one off street parking stall.
Pets Allowed: Cats and Dogs (2 only)
Pet Deposit............$500    Pets are welcome, at the owner's discretion, with a refundable Pet Deposit ($500.00).
Please ask about our Pet Policy.
Call, email, or text for more information!
Wall to Wall Luxury Vinyl Flooring on 1st floor
This property complies with the Fair Chance Access to Housing Ordinance, which is a Berkeley law that prohibits rental discrimination based on criminal history.
Thank you for your interest in Hopkins Park Apartments!
